products.title: 01. LA LAGARTIJA
products.description: Mysterious and treacherous... The best choice for the start of your journey! It will provide you a rich delicious flavor.

products.title: 02. EL TIGRE
products.description: Really dark coffee, only for the real gourments. It has bitter flavor of grapefruits and is mixed with a little bit peanuts with caramel.

products.title: 03. LA CUCARACHA
products.description: Sweet and intense with a big amonut of different flavors. Caramel, grapes, strawberry, you title it! It's great choice for warm summer day.
